Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class Context

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.Context
public final class Context
extends java.lang.Object
A class for the communication between a component and its parent.

  • Constructor Details

    • Context

      public Context​(Context context, int border, int offset, boolean focus)
      Constructor that should be used when a parent is calling a method by the child. inter and onTop are inherited without modification.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the parent
      border - the horizontal border (left and right) for the child
      offset - the vertical position of the child relative to the parent's position
      focus - focus state of the parent

    • Context

      public Context​(Context context, int border, int offset, boolean focus, boolean onTop)
      Constructor that should be used when a parent is calling a method by the child. inter and onTop are inherited without modification.
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the parent
      border - the horizontal border (left and right) for the child
      offset - the vertical position of the child relative to the parent's position
      focus - focus state of the parent
      onTop - whether component is in the front

    • Context

      public Context​(Interface inter, int width, java.awt.Point position, boolean focus, boolean onTop)
      Constructor that should be used by the root parent (i.e. ClickGUI).
      Parameters:
      inter - the current Interface
      width - the width of the component
      position - the position of the component
      focus - set to false, to disable the component from having focus
      onTop - set to false, if a component is above another component at the current cursor position

  • Method Details

      Returns the component size.

      public void setHeight​(int height)
      Sets the height of the component.
      Parameters:
      height - the component's height

    • getPos

      public java.awt.Point getPos()
      Returns the component position.
      Returns:
      the component position

    • hasFocus

      public boolean hasFocus()
      Returns the focus state of the parent.
      Returns:
      the focus state of the parent

    • onTop

      public boolean onTop()
      Check if component is the highest at cursor position.
      Returns:
      set to false, if another component is above this component at the current mouse cursor position

    • requestFocus

      public void requestFocus()
      Used to indicate to the parent that the current component has to have focus within the parent.

    • foucsRequested

      public boolean foucsRequested()
      Returns focusRequested.
      Returns:
      whether the child is requesting focus.

    • isHovered

      public boolean isHovered()
      Get mouse hover state.
      Returns:
      set to true, if mouse is hovering and component isn't below another one

    • isClicked

      public boolean isClicked()
      Get mouse click state.
      Returns:
      set to true, if isHovered() is true and the left mouse button is clicked

    • getRect

      public java.awt.Rectangle getRect()
      Get rectangle indicating component position.
      Returns:
      construct a rectangle out of the current component position and size
